name: Dice Roller Simulator
description:
Have you lost your dice? Are you bored with your dice and what to use virtual one? Here’s an app for you – a nice and simple dice roller simulator useful for board games, deciding on something and anything you can think of :)


Features:
- tap dice or shake iPhone/iPod to roll a dice
- 6 backgrounds and 3 dice colours to choose
- roll up to 5 dices at once
- nice rolling animation
- retina display support
- no ads
- you can’t loose it :)
